content: Which iconic artist is known for his paintings of melting clocks and dreamlike landscapes, such as "The Persistence of Memory"?

I believe you're referring to Salvador Dalí. He was a prominent Spanish surrealist artist whose work is characterized by melting clocks, dreamlike imagery, and a general sense of the irrational and subconscious. "The Persistence of Memory" is one of his most famous paintings, featuring soft, drooping clocks in a desert landscape.
